author: Adam Shaw
title: House Freedom Caucus calls on House Dems to back vote on keeping Title 42 in place at border

sentence: Maggie Hassan, Raphael Warnock, Mark Kelly and Catherine Cortez Masto want to stop the rule from being lifted.
title: Biden Move Lifting COVID Curbs on Migrants at Border Has Dems on Defensive

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema (D-AZ), Mark Kelly (D-AZ), James Lankford (R-OK), John Cornyn (R-TX), Joe Manchin (D-WV), Shelley Moore Capito (R-WV), Jon Tester (D-MT), Rob Portman (R-OH), Maggie Hassan (D-NH), Thom Tillis (R-NC), and John Thune (R-SD) sponsored the Senate version of the bill.
author: Sean Moran
